com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Interface PosTaggerService


  • public interface PosTaggerService
    Interface for retrieving implementations of various pos-tagger interfaces.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PosTag getPosTag(String code, String description, PosTagOpenClassIndicator openClassIndicator)
      Construct a pos-tag for a given code, desciption and open-class indicator.
      PosTagComparator getPosTagComparator()
      Get a pos-tagger comparator.
      ClassificationEventStream getPosTagEventStream(PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader corpusReader, Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures)
      Create a classification event stream for a given corpus reader and set of features.
      PosTagSequenceProcessor getPosTagFeatureTester(Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures, Set<String> testWords, File file)
      A feature tester, which outputs results of applying features to the items encountered in a given corpus.
      PosTaggedToken getPosTaggedToken(Token token, Decision decision)
      Construct a pos-tagged token for a given token and given decision - the Decision.getOutcome() must be a valid PosTag.getCode() from the current PosTagSet.
      PosTagger getPosTagger(ClassificationModel model, int beamWidth)
      Get a pos-tagger defined by a particular machine learning model.
      PosTagger getPosTagger(Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures, DecisionMaker decisionMaker, int beamWidth)
      Get a pos-tagger.
      PosTaggerEvaluator getPosTaggerEvaluator(PosTagger posTagger)
      Get a pos-tagger evaluator.
      PosTagSequence getPosTagSequence(TokenSequence tokenSequence)
      Construct an empty pos-tag sequence, based on a given TokenSequence that needs to be pos-tagged.
      PosTagSet getPosTagSet(File file)
      Loads a PosTagSet from a file or list of strings.
      PosTagSet getPosTagSet(List<String> descriptors)
      Same as getPosTagSet(File), but replaces the file with a List of Strings.
      PosTagSet getPosTagSet(Scanner scanner)
      Same as getPosTageSet(file), but replaces file with a scanner.
      PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader getRegexBasedCorpusReader(Reader reader)
      Returns a corpus reader based on the use of Regex.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosTagger

        PosTagger getPosTagger(Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures,
                     DecisionMaker decisionMaker,
                     int beamWidth)
        Get a pos-tagger.
        Parameters:
        decisionMaker - the decision maker used to make pos-tagging decisions
        posTaggerFeatures - the features on which the decision maker's decisions are made.
        beamWidth - the maximum beamwidth to consider during the beam search
        Returns:
        the pos-tagger

      • getPosTagger

        PosTagger getPosTagger(ClassificationModel model,
                     int beamWidth)
        Get a pos-tagger defined by a particular machine learning model.
        Parameters:
        beamWidth - the maximum beamwidth to consider during the beam search
        Returns:
        the pos-tagger

      • getPosTaggerEvaluator

        PosTaggerEvaluator getPosTaggerEvaluator(PosTagger posTagger)
        Get a pos-tagger evaluator.
        Parameters:
        posTagger - the pos-tagger to evaluate.

      • getPosTagComparator

        PosTagComparator getPosTagComparator()
        Get a pos-tagger comparator.

      • getPosTagSequence

        PosTagSequence getPosTagSequence(TokenSequence tokenSequence)
        Construct an empty pos-tag sequence, based on a given TokenSequence that needs to be pos-tagged.
        Parameters:
        tokenSequence - the token sequence to be pos-tagged.

      • getPosTaggedToken

        PosTaggedToken getPosTaggedToken(Token token,
                               Decision decision)
        Construct a pos-tagged token for a given token and given decision - the Decision.getOutcome() must be a valid PosTag.getCode() from the current PosTagSet.
        Parameters:
        token - the token to be tagged
        decision - the decision used to tag it

      • getPosTag

        PosTag getPosTag(String code,
               String description,
               PosTagOpenClassIndicator openClassIndicator)
        Construct a pos-tag for a given code, desciption and open-class indicator.
        Parameters:
        code - the pos-tag's code
        description - the pos-tag's description
        openClassIndicator - the pos-tag's open class indicator.

      • getPosTagEventStream

        ClassificationEventStream getPosTagEventStream(PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader corpusReader,
                                             Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures)
        Create a classification event stream for a given corpus reader and set of features.
        Parameters:
        corpusReader - the corpus reader used to read the training corpus
        posTaggerFeatures - the features used to describe events in the training corpus

      • getPosTagSet

        PosTagSet getPosTagSet(File file)
        Loads a PosTagSet from a file or list of strings. The file has the following format:
        First row: PosTagSet name
        Second row: PosTagSet ISO 2 letter language code
        Remaining rows:
        PosTagCode tab description tab OPEN/CLOSED
        e.g.
        ADJ adjectif OPEN

      • getPosTagSet

        PosTagSet getPosTagSet(Scanner scanner)
        Same as getPosTageSet(file), but replaces file with a scanner.
        Parameters:
        scanner -
        Returns:

      • getPosTagSet

        PosTagSet getPosTagSet(List<String> descriptors)
        Same as getPosTagSet(File), but replaces the file with a List of Strings.
        Parameters:
        descriptors -
        Returns:

      • getRegexBasedCorpusReader

        PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader getRegexBasedCorpusReader(Reader reader)
        Returns a corpus reader based on the use of Regex. See class description for details.
        Parameters:
        reader -
        Returns:

      • getPosTagFeatureTester

        PosTagSequenceProcessor getPosTagFeatureTester(Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> posTaggerFeatures,
                                             Set<String> testWords,
                                             File file)
        A feature tester, which outputs results of applying features to the items encountered in a given corpus.
        Parameters:
        posTaggerFeatures - the features to test
        testWords - limit the test to certain words only
        file - the file where the test results should be written
        Returns:
